# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-105">준수 센터의 DLP (데이터 손실 방지)에는 DLP 정책에서 사용할 수 있는 중요 한 정보 유형이 많이 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e388e-106">이 항목에서는 이러한 모든 중요한 정보 유형의 목록과 DLP 정책이 이러한 각 유형을 검색할 때 찾는 내용을 보여 줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e388e-107">중요한 정보 유형은 정규식이나 함수로 식별될 수 있는 패턴으로 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e388e-108">또한 키워드 및 체크섬과 같은 확증적인 증거를 사용하여 중요한 정보 유형을 식별할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e388e-109">이러한 평가 프로세스에서 신뢰 수준 및 근접성도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>
  
## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-110">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-110">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-111">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-112">서식이 지정 되거나 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시 될 수 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-112">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-113">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-114">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-114">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-115">0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-115">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-116">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-116">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-117">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-117">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-118">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-118">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-119">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-119">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-120">서식 없음: 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 연속 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-120">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-121">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-121">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-122">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-122">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-123">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-123">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-124">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-124">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-125">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-126">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-126">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-146">아르헨티나 국가 id (DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-146">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-147">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-148">마침표로 구분된 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-148">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-149">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-150">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-150">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-151">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-151">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-152">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-152">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-153">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-153">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-154">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-154">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-155">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-155">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-156">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-157">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-157">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-158">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-159">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-159">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-160">정규식 Regex_argentina_national_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-160">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-161">Keyword_argentina_national_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-161">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-167">DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-167">DNI</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-173">오스트레일리아 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-173">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-174">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-175">뱅크 상태 분기 번호 유무에 관계 없이 6 ~ twn 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-175">six to twn digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-176">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-177">계정 번호는 6 ~ 10 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-177">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-178">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-178">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-179">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-179">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-180">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-180">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-181">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-181">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-182">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-182">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-183">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-183">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-184">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-184">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-185">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-185">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-186">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-186">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-187">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-187">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-188">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-188">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-189">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-189">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-190">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-190">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-191">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-191">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-192">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-192">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-193">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-193">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-194">swift bank code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-194">swift bank code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-195">correspondent bank</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-195">correspondent bank</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-196">base currency</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-196">base currency</span></span>

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-207">오스트레일리아 근무처 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-207">Australia business number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-208">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-209">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-209">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-210">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-210">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-211">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-211">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-212">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-212">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-213">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-213">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-214">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-214">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-215">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-215">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-216">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-216">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-217">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-217">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-218">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-218">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-219">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-220">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-220">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-221">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-222">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-222">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-223">Func_australian_business_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-223">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-224">Keywords_australian_business_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-224">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-225">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-225">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-226">Func_australian_business_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-226">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_australia_business_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-228">Keyword_australia_business_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-228">Keyword_australia_business_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-229">오스트레일리아 business 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-229">australia business no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-230">근무처 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-230">business number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-236">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-236">Australia company number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-237">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-238">구분 기호가 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-238">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-239">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-240">구분 기호가 있는 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-240">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-241">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-241">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-242">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-242">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-243">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-243">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-244">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-244">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-245">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-245">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-246">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-247">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-247">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-248">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-249">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-249">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-250">Func_Australian_Company_Number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-250">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-251">Keyword_Australian_Company_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-251">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-252">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-252">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-253">Func_Australian_Company_Number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-253">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-256">될</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-256">acn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-258">오스트레일리아 회사 번호 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-258">australia company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-259">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-259">australia company number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-260">오스트레일리아 company 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-260">australian company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-261">오스트레일리아 company 아니요 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-261">australian company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-262">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-262">australian company number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-263">오스트레일리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-263">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-264">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-265">9 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-265">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-266">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-267">9 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-267">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-268">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-268">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-269">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-269">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-270">5 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-270">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-271">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-271">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-272">1 ~ 2 개의 선택적 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-272">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-273">4 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-273">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-274">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-274">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-275">9 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-275">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-276">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-276">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-277">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-277">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-278">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-278">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-279">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-279">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-280">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-280">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-281">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-281">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-282">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-282">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-295">DriversLicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-295">DriversLicences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-296">Drivers Lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-296">Drivers Lic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-297">Drivers Lics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-297">Drivers Lics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-298">Drivers Licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-298">Drivers Licence</span></span>

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-382">오스트레일리아 의료 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-382">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-383">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-383">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-384">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-384">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-385">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-385">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-386">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-386">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-387">첫 번째 숫자는 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-387">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-388">9 번째 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-388">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-389">10 번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-389">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-390">11 번째 숫자 (선택 사항)는 개별 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-390">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-391">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-392">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-392">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-393">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-394">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-394">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-395">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-395">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-396">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-396">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-397">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-397">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_australia_medical_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-399">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-399">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-400">bank account details</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-400">bank account details</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-401">medicare payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-401">medicare payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-402">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-402">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-403">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-403">bank payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-404">information branch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-404">information branch</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-405">credit card loan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-405">credit card loan</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-409">오스트레일리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-409">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-410">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-410">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-411">문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-411">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-412">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-412">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-413">1개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-413">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-414">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-414">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-415">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-415">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-416">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-416">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-417">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-417">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-418">Regex_australia_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-418">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-419">Keyword_passport 또는 Keyword_australia_passport_number의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-419">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-420">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-420">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-453">오스트레일리아 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-453">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-454">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-454">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-455">8 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-455">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-456">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-456">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-457">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백을 사용 하 여 표시 되는 8 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-457">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-458">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-458">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-459">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-459">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-460">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-460">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-461">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-461">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-462">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-462">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-463">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-464">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-464">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-465">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-466">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-466">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-467">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-467">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-468">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-468">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-469">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-469">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-481">오스트리아 드라이버의 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-481">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-482">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-482">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-483">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-484">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-484">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-485">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-486">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-486">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-487">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-487">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-488">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-488">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-489">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-489">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-490">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-490">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-491">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-491">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-492">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-492">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-509">오스트리아 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-509">Austria identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-510">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-510">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-511">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-511">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-512">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-512">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-513">24 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-513">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="e388e-514">22 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-514">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-515">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-515">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-516">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-516">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-517">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-517">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-518">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-518">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-519">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-519">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-520">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-520">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-521">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-521">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-522">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-522">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-523">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-523">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-525">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-526">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-526">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-527">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-527">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-528">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 sensitiveinformation type 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-528">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-529">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-529">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-530">1 개의 문자 다음에 선택적 공백, 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-530">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-531">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-531">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-532">한 글자, 일곱 자리 및 한 가지 공백 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-532">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-533">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-533">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-534">1 개의 공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-534">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-535">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-535">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-536">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-536">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-537">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-537">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-538">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-538">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-539">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-539">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-540">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-540">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-541">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-541">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-542">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-542">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-543">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-543">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-544">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-544">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-545">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-545">austrian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-546">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-546">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-547">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-547">reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-548">österreichisch reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-548">österreichisch reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-549">오스트리아 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-549">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-550">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-550">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-551">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-552">지정 된 형식의 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-552">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-553">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-554">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-554">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-555">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-555">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-556">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-556">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-557">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-557">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-558">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-558">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-559">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-559">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-560">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-560">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-561">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-561">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-562">함수 ' Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-562">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-563">_or_equivalent '는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-563">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-564">from 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-564">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-565">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-565">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-566">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-566">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-571">social security code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-571">social security code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-572">보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-572">insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-573">오스트리아</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-573">austrian ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-576">보험 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-576">insurance code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-577">보험 코드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-577">insurance code#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-578">사회 alsecurityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-578">socialsecurityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-579">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-579">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-580">soziale sicherheit kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-580">soziale sicherheit kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-581">versicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-581">versicherungsnummer</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-582">오스트리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-582">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-583">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-583">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-584">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-584">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-585">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-585">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-586">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-586">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-587">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-587">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-588">하이픈 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-588">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-589">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-589">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-590">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-590">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-591">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-591">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-592">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-592">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-593">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-593">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-594">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-594">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-595">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-595">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-596">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-596">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-597">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-597">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-598">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-598">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-599">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-599">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-609">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-609">tax no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-611">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-611">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-612">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-612">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-613">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-613">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-614">taxidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-614">taxidnumber#</span></span>

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-622">오스트리아 값 추가 된 세금</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-622">Austria value added tax</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-623">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-623">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-624">11 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-624">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-625">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-625">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-626">11 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-626">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-627">A 또는 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-627">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-628">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-628">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-629">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-629">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-630">U 또는 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-630">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-631">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-631">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-632">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-632">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-633">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-633">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-634">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-634">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-635">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-635">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-636">1 ~ 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-636">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-637">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-637">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-638">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-638">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-639">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-639">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-640">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-640">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-641">Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-641">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-642">Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-642">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-643">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-643">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-644">Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-644">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-645">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-645">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_austria_value_added_tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-646">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-646">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-647">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-647">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-648">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-648">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-649">오스트리아 vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-649">austrian vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-650">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-650">vat no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-651">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-651">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-652">값이 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-652">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-653">오스트리아-vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-653">austrian vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-654">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-654">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-655">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-655">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-656">mwstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-656">mwstnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-657">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-657">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-658">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-658">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-659">vat 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-659">vat identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-660">atu 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-660">atu number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-661">uid 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-661">uid number</span></span>


## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-662">Azure DocumentDB 인증 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-662">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-663">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-663">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-664">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-664">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-665">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-665">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-666">"DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-666">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-667">3-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-667">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-668">보다 큼 기호 (>), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-668">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-669">86의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-669">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-670">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-670">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-671">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-672">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-672">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-673">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-674">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-674">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-675">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-675">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-676">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-676">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-677">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-677">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-678">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-678">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-679">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-679">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-680">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-680">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-681">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-681">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-682">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-682">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-683">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-683">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-684">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-684">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-685">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-685">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-686">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-686">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-687">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-687">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e388e-688">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-688">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-689">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-689">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e388e-690">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-690">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-691">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-691">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-692">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-693">"Server", "server" 또는 "data source" 라는 문자열은 "cloudapp. azure"를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-693">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e388e-694">com "또는" cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-694">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e388e-695">net "또는" 데이터베이스.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-695">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e388e-696">net "과 문자열" Password "또는" password "또는" pwd "가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-696">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-697">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-697">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-698">문자열 "Server", "Server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-698">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-699">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-699">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-700">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-700">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-701">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-701">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-702">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-702">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-703">문자열 "cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-703">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e388e-704">com "," cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-704">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e388e-705">net "또는" database.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-705">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e388e-706">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-706">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-707">1-300에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-707">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-708">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-708">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-709">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-709">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-710">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-710">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-711">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-711">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-712">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-712">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-713">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-713">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-714">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-714">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-715">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-715">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-716">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-716">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-717">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-717">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-718">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-718">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-719">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-719">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-720">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-720">Keywords</span></span>
