## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-734">Azure IoT connection 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-734">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-735">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-735">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-736">문자열 "HostName" 뒤에 "azure-devices" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-736">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e388e-737">net "및" SharedAccessKey "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-737">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-738">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-738">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-739">문자열 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-739">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-740">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-740">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-741">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-741">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-742">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-742">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-743">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-743">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-744">문자열 "azure-장치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-744">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e388e-745">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-745">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-746">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-746">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-747">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-747">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-748">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-748">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-749">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-749">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-750">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-750">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-751">43의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-751">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-752">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-752">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-753">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-753">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-754">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-754">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-755">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-755">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-756">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-756">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-757">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-757">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-758">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-758">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-759">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-759">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-760">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-760">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-761">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-761">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-763">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-763">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-764">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-764">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-765">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-765">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-766">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-766">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-767">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-767">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-768">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-768">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-769">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-769">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e388e-770">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-770">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-771">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-771">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e388e-772">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-772">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-773">Azure 게시 설정 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-773">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-774">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-774">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-775">문자열 "userpwd =" 다음에 영숫자 문자열이 나옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-775">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-776">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-776">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-777">문자열 "userpwd ="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-777">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-778">60 대 문자와 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-778">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-779">큰따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-779">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-780">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-780">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-781">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-781">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-782">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-782">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-783">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-783">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-784">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-784">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-785">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-785">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-786">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-786">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-788">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-788">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-791">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-791">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-792">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-792">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-793">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-793">onebox</span></span>

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-800">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-800">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-801">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-801">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-802">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-802">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e388e-803">net "문자열" password "또는" pwd "를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-803">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-804">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-804">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-805">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-805">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e388e-806">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-806">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-807">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-807">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-808">문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-808">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-809">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-809">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-810">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-810">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-811">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-811">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-812">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-812">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-813">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-813">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-814">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-814">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-815">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-815">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-816">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-816">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-817">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-817">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-818">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-818">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-819">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-819">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-834">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-834">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-835">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-835">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-836">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-836">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-837">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-837">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-838">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-838">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-839">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-839">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-840">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-840">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-841">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-841">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-842">대/소문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 43-53 자 사이의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-842">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-843">문자열 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-843">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-844">소문자 또는 대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-844">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-845">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-845">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-846">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-846">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-847">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-847">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-848">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-848">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-849">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-849">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-850">Azure service bus 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-850">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-851">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-851">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-852">문자열 "끝점" 뒤에 "servicebus" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 나와 있는 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-852">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e388e-853">net "및" SharedAccesKey "을 차례로 누릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-853">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-854">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-854">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-855">문자열 "끝점"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-855">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-856">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-856">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-857">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-857">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-858">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-858">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-859">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-859">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-860">문자열 "servicebus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-860">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e388e-861">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-861">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-862">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-862">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-863">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-863">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-864">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-864">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-865">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-865">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-866">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-866">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-867">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-867">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-868">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-868">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-869">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-869">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-870">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-870">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-871">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-871">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-872">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-872">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-873">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-873">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-874">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-874">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-875">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-875">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-876">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-876">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-879">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-879">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-880">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-880">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-881">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-881">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-882">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-882">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-883">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-883">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-884">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-884">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-885">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-885">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e388e-886">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-886">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-887">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-887">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e388e-888">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-888">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-889">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-889">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-890">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-890">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-891">"DefaultEndpointsProtocol" 문자열은 "AccountKey" 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-891">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-892">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-892">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-893">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-893">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-894">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-894">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-895">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-895">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-896">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-896">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-897">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-897">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-898">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-898">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-899">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-899">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-900">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-900">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-901">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-901">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-902">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-902">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-903">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-903">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-904">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-904">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-905">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-905">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-906">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-906">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-907">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-907">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-908">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-908">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-909">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-909">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-910">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-910">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-911">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-911">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_azure_emulator_storage_account_filter"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-912">CEP_azure_emulator_storage_account_filter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-912">CEP_azure_emulator_storage_account_filter</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-913">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-913">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-928">Azure 저장소 계정 키 (일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-928">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-929">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-929">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-930">아래 패턴에 윤곽선이 있는 문자 앞 이나 뒤에 오는 86 문자의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-930">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-931">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-931">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-932">0은 보다 큼 기호 (>), 아포스트로피 ('), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 숫자 기호 (#) 중 하나입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-932">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-933">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-933">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-934">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-934">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-935">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-935">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-936">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-936">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-937">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-937">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-938">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-938">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-939">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-939">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-940">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-940">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-941">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-941">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-942">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-942">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-943">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-943">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-944">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-944">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-945">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-945">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-946">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-946">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-947">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-947">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-948">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-948">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-949">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-949">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-950">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-950">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-951">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-951">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-973">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-973">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-974">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-975">11 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-975">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-976">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-976">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-977">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-977">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-978">6 자리 숫자와 2 개의 선택적 마침표 (YY) 19. DD for 생년월일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-978">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-979">점, 대시, 공백 등의 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-979">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-980">3 개의 순차 숫자 (남성의의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 짝수의 경우에도)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-980">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-981">점, 대시, 공백 등의 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-981">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-982">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-982">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-983">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-983">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-984">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-984">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-985">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-985">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-986">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-986">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-987">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-987">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-988">Keyword_belgium_national_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-988">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-989">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-989">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-990">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-990">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-991">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-991">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-992">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-992">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1051">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1051">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1052">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1052">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1053">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1054">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1054">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1055">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1055">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1056">2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1056">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1057">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1057">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1058">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1058">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1059">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1059">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1060">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1060">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1061">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1061">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1062">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1062">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1063">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1063">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1064">Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1064">Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1065">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1065">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1066">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1066">belgian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1067">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1067">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1068">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1068">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1069">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1069">paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1070">reisepass kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1070">reisepass kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1071">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1071">reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1072">벨기에 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1072">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1073">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1073">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1074">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1074">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1075">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1075">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1076">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1076">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1077">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1077">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1078">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1078">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1079">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1079">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1080">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1080">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1081">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1081">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1082">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1082">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1083">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1083">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1084">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1084">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1085">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1085">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1105">벨기에 값 세금 번호 추가 됨</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1105">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1106">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1106">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1107">12 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1107">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1108">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1108">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1109">12 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1109">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1110">a 문자 B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1110">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1111">문자 E 또는 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1111">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1112">숫자 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1112">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1113">1부터 9 까지의 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1113">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1114">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1114">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1115">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1116">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1116">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1117">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1117">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1118">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1119">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1119">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1120">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1121">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1121">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1122">Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1122">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1123">Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1123">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1124">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1124">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1125">Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1125">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1130">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1130">vat no</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1137">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1137">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1138">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1138">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1139">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1139">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1140">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1140">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1141">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1141">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1142">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1142">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1143">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1143">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1144">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1144">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1145">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1145">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1146">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1146">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1147">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1147">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1148">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1148">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1149">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1149">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1150">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1150">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1151">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1152">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1152">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1153">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1154">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1154">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1155">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1155">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1156">Keyword_brazil_cpf에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1156">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1157">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1157">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1158">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1158">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1159">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1159">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1160">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1160">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1172">브라질 legal 엔티티 번호 (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1172">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1173">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1174">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1174">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1175">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1175">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1176">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1176">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1177">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1177">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1178">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1178">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1179">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1179">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1180">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1180">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1181">3 자리 숫자 (처음 8 자리 숫자는 등록 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1181">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1182">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1182">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1183">4 자리 지점 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1183">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1184">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1184">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1185">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1185">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1186">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1186">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1187">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1187">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1188">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1188">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1189">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1189">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1190">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1190">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1191">Keyword_brazil_cnpj에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1191">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1192">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1192">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1193">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1193">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1194">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1194">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1195">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1195">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1217">브라질 국립 식별 카드 (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1217">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1218">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1218">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1219">Registro Geral (이전 형식): 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1219">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1220">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식): 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1220">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1221">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1221">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1222">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1222">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1223">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1223">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1224">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1224">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1225">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1225">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1226">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1226">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1227">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1227">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1228">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1228">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1229">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1229">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1230">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1230">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1231">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1231">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1232">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1232">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1233">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1233">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1234">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1234">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1235">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1235">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1236">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1237">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1237">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1238">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1238">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1239">Keyword_brazil_rg에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1239">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1240">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1240">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1241">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1241">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1242">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1242">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1243">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1243">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1248">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1248">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1249">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1249">número de rregistro</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1253">RIC(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1253">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1254">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1254">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1255">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1255">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1256">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1256">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1257">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1257">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1258">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1258">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1259">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1259">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1260">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1260">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1261">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1261">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1262">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1262">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1263">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1263">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1264">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1264">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1265">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1265">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1284">불가리아 uniform 민사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1284">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1285">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1286">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1286">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1287">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1288">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1288">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1289">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1289">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1290">출생 순서에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1290">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1291">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자와이에 해당 하는 짝수 자리 숫자 및 암의 홀수 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1291">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1292">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1292">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1293">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1294">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1294">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1295">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1296">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1296">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1297">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1297">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1298">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1298">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1299">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1299">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1300">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1300">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1306">고 대 cn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1306">bucn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1307">edinen grazhdanski nomer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1307">edinen grazhdanski nomer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1308">egn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1308">egn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1309">egn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1309">egn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1310">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1310">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1311">
