## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1345">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1345">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1346">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1346">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1347">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1347">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1348">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1348">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1349">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1349">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1350">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1350">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1351">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1351">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1352">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1352">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1353">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1353">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1354">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1354">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1355">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1355">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1356">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1356">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1357">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1357">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1358">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1358">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1359">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1359">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1360">불가리아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1360">bulgarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1361">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1361">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1362">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1362">номер на паспорта</span></span>


## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1363">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1363">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1364">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1365">7 또는 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1365">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1366">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1367">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7 또는 12자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1367">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1368">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1368">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1369">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1369">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1370">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1370">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1371">3 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1371">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1372">제로 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1372">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1373">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1373">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1374">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1374">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1375">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1375">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1376">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1376">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1377">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1377">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1378">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1378">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1379">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1379">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1380">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1380">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1381">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1381">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1382">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1382">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1383">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1383">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1407">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1407">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1408">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1409">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1409">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1410">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1410">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1411">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1411">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1412">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1412">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1413">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1413">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1414">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1414">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1415">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1415">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1416">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1416">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1417">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1417">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1418">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1418">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1554">캐나다 건강 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1554">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1555">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1555">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1556">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1556">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1557">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1557">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1558">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1558">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1559">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1559">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1560">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1560">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1561">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1561">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1562">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1562">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1563">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1563">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1564">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1564">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1565">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1565">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1567">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1567">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1568">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1568">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1569">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1569">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1570">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1570">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1571">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1571">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1572">patient hospital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1572">patient hospital</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1573">psychiatrist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1573">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1574">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1574">workers compensation</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1576">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1576">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1577">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1578">두 개의 대문자와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1578">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1579">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1580">두 개의 대문자와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1580">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1581">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1582">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1582">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1583">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1584">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1584">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1585">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1585">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1586">Keyword_canada_passport_number 또는 Keyword_passport의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1586">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1616">캐나다 PHIN (개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1616">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1617">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1617">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1618">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1618">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1619">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1619">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1620">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1620">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1621">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1621">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1622">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1622">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1623">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1623">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1624">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1624">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1625">Regex_canada_phin 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1625">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1626">Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces에서 키워드가 두 개 이상 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1626">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1659">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1659">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1660">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1661">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백이 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1661">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1662">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1663">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1663">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1664">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1664">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1665">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1665">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1666">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1666">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1667">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1667">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1668">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1668">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1669">서식 없음: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1669">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1670">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1671">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1671">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1672">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1673">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1673">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1674">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1674">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1675">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1675">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1676">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1676">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1677">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1677">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1678">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1678">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1679">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1679">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1680">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1680">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1681">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1681">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1682">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1682">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1683">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1683">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1708">칠레 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1708">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1709">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1709">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1710">7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 구분 기호, 검사 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1710">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1711">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1711">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1712">7 ~ 8 자리와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1712">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1713">1 ~ 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1713">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1714">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1714">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1715">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1715">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1716">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1716">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1717">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1717">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1718">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1718">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1719">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1719">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1720">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1720">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1721">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1721">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1722">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1722">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1723">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1723">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1724">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1724">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1725">Keyword_chile_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1725">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1726">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1726">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1727">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1727">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1728">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1728">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1729">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1729">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1730">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1730">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_chile_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1731">Keyword_chile_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1731">Keyword_chile_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1732">National Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1732">National Identification Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1735">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1735">Identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1736">Rol Único Nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1736">Rol Único Nacional</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1738">Rol Único Tributario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1738">Rol Único Tributario</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1739">RUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1739">RUT</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1740">Cédula de Identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1740">Cédula de Identidad</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1741">Número De Identificación Nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1741">Número De Identificación Nacional</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1742">Tarjeta de identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1742">Tarjeta de identificación</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1743">Identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1743">Identificación</span></span> 

   
## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1744">중국의 중국 id 카드 (PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1744">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1745">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1745">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1746">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1746">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1747">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1747">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1748">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1748">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1749">주소 코드에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1749">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1750">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1750">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1751">주문 코드에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1751">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1752">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1752">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1753">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1753">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1754">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1754">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1755">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1755">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1756">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1756">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1757">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1757">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1758">Keyword_china_resident_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1758">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1759">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1759">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1760">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1760">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1761">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1761">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1762">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1762">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1764">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1764">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1765">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1765">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1766">중국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1766">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1767">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1767">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1768">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1768">身份证</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1770">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1770">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1771">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1771">鉴定</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1775">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1775">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1776">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1776">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1777">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 (dddddddddddddddd), Luhn 테스트를 통과 해야 하는 16 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1777">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1778">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1778">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1779">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 상품권 및 식사권을 비롯하여 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드 카드를 검색하는 매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1779">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1780">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1780">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1781">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1781">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-1782">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1782">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1783">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1783">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1784">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1784">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1785">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1785">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1786">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1786">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1787">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1787">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1788">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1788">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1789">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1789">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-1790">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1790">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1791">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1791">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-1792">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-1792">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2052">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2052">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2053">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2053">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2054">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2054">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2055">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2055">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2056">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2057">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2057">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2058">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2058">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2059">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2059">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2060">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2060">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2061">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2061">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2062">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2062">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2063">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2063">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2064">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2064">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2069">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2069">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2079">크로아티아 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2079">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2080">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2080">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2081">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2081">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2082">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2082">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2083">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2083">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2084">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2084">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2085">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2085">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2086">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2086">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2087">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2087">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2088">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2088">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2089">Func_croatia_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2089">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2090">Keyword_croatia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2090">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2121">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2121">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2122">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2122">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2123">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2123">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2124">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2124">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2125">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2125">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2126">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2126">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2127">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2127">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2128">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2128">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2129">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2129">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2130">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2130">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2131">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2131">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2132">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2132">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2133">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2133">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2134">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2134">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2135">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2135">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2136">크로아티아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2136">croatian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2137">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2137">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2138">broj putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2138">broj putovnice</span></span>

   
## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2139">크로아티아 OIB (개인 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2139">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2140">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2141">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2141">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2142">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2143">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2143">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2144">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2144">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2145">최종 숫자가 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2145">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2146">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2146">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2147">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2147">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2148">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2148">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2149">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2149">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2150">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2150">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2151">Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2151">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2152">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2152">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2153">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2153">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2154">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2154">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2155">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2155">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2186">크로아티아 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 하는 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2186">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2187">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2187">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2188">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2189">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2189">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2190">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2191">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2191">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2192">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2192">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2193">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2193">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2194">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2194">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2195">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2195">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2196">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2196">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2197">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2197">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2198">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2198">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2199">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2199">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2200">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2200">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2201">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2201">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2202">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2202">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2203">Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2203">Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2204">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2204">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2205">마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2205">master citizen number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2206">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2206">national identification number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2218">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2218">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2219">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2219">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2220">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2220">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2221">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2221">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2222">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2222">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2223">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2223">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2224">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2224">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2225">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2225">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2226">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2226">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2227">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2227">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2228">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2228">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2229">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2229">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2235">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2235">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2238">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2238">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2239">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2239">driver's license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2241">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2241">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2244">키프로스 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2244">Cyprus identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2245">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2245">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2246">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2246">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2247">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2248">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2248">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2249">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2249">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2250">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2250">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2251">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2251">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2252">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2252">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2253">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2253">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2254">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2254">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2255">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2255">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2256">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2256">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2257">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2257">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2258">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2258">identity card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2261">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2261">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2262">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2262">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2263">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2263">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2264">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2264">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2265">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2265">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2266">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 6-8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2266">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2267">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2268">한 문자 다음에 6 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2268">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2269">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2269">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2270">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2270">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2271">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2271">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2272">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2272">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2273">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2273">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2274">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2274">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2275">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2275">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2276">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2276">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2277">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2277">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2278">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2278">cyprus passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2279">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2279">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2280">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2280">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2281">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2281">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2282">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2282">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2283">지정 된 패턴에서 8 자리 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2283">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2284">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2284">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2285">8 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2285">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2286">"0" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2286">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2287">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2287">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2288">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2288">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2289">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2290">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2290">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2291">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2292">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2292">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2293">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2293">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2294">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2294">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2295">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2295">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2296">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2296">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2297">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2297">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2298">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2298">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2299">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2324">체코어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2324">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2325">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2325">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2326">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2326">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2327">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2327">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2328">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2328">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2329">8 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2329">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2330">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2330">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2331">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2331">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2332">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2332">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2333">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2333">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2334">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2334">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2335">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2335">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2336">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2336">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2337">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2337">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2338">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2338">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2339">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2339">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2343">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2343">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2344">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2344">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2348">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2348">driver's license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2350">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2350">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2351">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2351">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2352">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2352">driving license number</span></span>
