## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2355">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2355">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2356">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2356">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2357">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2358">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2358">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2359">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2360">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2360">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2361">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2362">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2362">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2363">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2364">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2364">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2365">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2365">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2366">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2366">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2367">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2367">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2368">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2368">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2369">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2369">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2370">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2370">czech passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2371">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2371">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2372">cestovní pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2372">cestovní pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2373">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2373">pas</span></span>


## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2374">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2374">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2375">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2375">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2376">선택적 슬래시 (이전 형식)가 있는 9 자리 숫자와 슬래시 (새 형식)가 있는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2376">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2377">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2377">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2378">9 자리 숫자 (이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2378">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2379">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2379">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2380">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2380">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2381">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2381">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2382">10 자리 숫자 (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2382">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2383">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2383">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2384">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2384">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2385">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2385">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2386">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2386">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2387">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2387">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2388">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2388">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2389">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2389">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2390">Func_czech_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2390">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2391">Keyword_czech_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2391">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2392">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2392">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2393">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2393">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2394">Func_czech_id_card_new_format 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2394">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2395">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2395">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2442">체코어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2442">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2443">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2443">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2444">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2445">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2445">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2446">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2447">10 자리 숫자와 백슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2447">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2448">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2448">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2449">백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2449">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2450">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2450">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2451">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2451">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2452">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2452">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2453">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2453">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2454">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2454">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2455">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2455">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2456">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2456">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2457">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2457">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2458">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2458">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2459">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2459">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2475">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2475">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2476">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2476">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2477">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2477">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2478">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2478">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2479">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2479">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2480">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2480">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2481">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2481">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2482">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2482">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2483">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2483">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2484">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2484">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2485">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2485">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2486">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2486">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2503">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2503">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2504">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2504">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2505">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2505">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2506">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2506">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2507">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2507">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2508">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2508">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2509">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2509">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2510">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2510">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2511">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2511">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2512">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2512">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2513">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2513">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2514">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2514">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2515">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2515">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2516">Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2516">Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2517">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2517">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2518">덴마크어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2518">danish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2519">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2519">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2520">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2520">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2521">pasnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2521">pasnummer</span></span>


## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2522">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2522">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2523">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2523">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2524">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2524">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2525">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2525">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2526">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2527">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2527">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2528">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2528">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2529">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2529">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2530">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2530">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2531">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2531">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2532">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2532">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2533">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2533">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2534">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2534">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2535">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2535">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2536">Keyword_denmark_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2536">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2537">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2537">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2538">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2538">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2539">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2539">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2540">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2540">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2612">덴마크 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2612">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2613">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2613">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2614">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2614">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2615">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2615">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2616">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2616">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2617">10 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2617">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2618">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2618">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2619">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2619">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2620">일련 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2620">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2621">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2621">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2622">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2622">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2623">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2623">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2624">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2624">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2625">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2625">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2626">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2626">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2627">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2627">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2628">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2628">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2629">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2629">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2630">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2630">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2631">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2631">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2632">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2632">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2633">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2633">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2634">nationalnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2634">nationalnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2635">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2635">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2636">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2636">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2637">국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2637">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2638">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2638">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2639">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2639">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2640">cpr-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2640">cpr-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2641">personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2641">personnummer</span></span>


## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2642">DEA (약품 집행 기관) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2642">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2643">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2643">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2644">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2644">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2645">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2645">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2646">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2646">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2647">이 가능한 문자 집합에서의 한 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함): abcdefghjklmnprstux (등록자 성의 코드)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2647">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2648">1 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 등록자 성의 성의 첫 번째 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2648">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2649">검사 숫자의 마지막 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2649">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2650">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2651">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2651">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2652">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2653">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2653">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2654">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2654">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2655">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2655">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2656">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2656">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2657">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2657">none</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2658">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2658">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2659">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2659">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2660">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2661">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2661">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2662">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2663">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2663">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2664">문자 "ET" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2664">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2665">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2665">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2666">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2667">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2667">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2668">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2669">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2669">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2670">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2670">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2671">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2671">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2672">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2672">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2673">Keywords_estonia_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2673">Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2674">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2674">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2675">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2675">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2676">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2676">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2677">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2677">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2678">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2678">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2679">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2679">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2680">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2680">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2681">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2681">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2682">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2682">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2683">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2683">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2684">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2684">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2685">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2685">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2686">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2686">permis de conduire</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2687">에스토니아 개인 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2687">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2688">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2688">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2689">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2689">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2690">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2690">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2691">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2691">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2692">출생의 성별 및 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (예: 1-2 암, 수, 19th 세기, 3-4:20th 세기, 5-6 = 21 세기)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2692">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2693">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2693">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2694">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2694">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2695">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2695">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2696">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2697">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2697">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2698">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2699">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2699">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2700">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2700">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2701">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2701">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2702">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2702">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2703">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2703">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2736">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2736">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2737">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2737">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2738">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2739">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2739">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2740">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2741">1 개의 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2741">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2742">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2742">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2743">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2743">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2744">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2744">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2745">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2745">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2746">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2746">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2747">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2747">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2748">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2748">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2749">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2749">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2750">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2750">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2752">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2752">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2754">EU 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2754">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2755">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2755">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2756">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2756">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2757">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2757">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2758">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2758">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2759">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2759">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2760">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2760">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-2761">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2761">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-2762">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2762">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2763">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2763">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2764">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2764">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2765">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2765">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2766">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2766">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2767">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2767">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2768">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2768">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2769">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2769">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-2770">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-2770">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3216">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3216">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3217">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3217">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3218">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3218">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3219">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3219">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3220">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3220">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3221">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3221">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3222">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3222">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3223">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3223">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3224">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3224">four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3225">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3225">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3226">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3226">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3227">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3227">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3228">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3228">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3229">정규식이 해당  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3229">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3230">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3230">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3231">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3231">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_finland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3232">Keywords_finland_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3232">Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3233">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3233">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3234">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3234">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3235">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3235">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3236">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3236">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3237">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3237">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3238">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3238">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3239">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3239">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3240">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3240">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3241">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3241">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3242">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3242">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3243">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3243">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3244">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3244">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3245">ajokortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3245">ajokortti</span></span>


## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3246">핀란드 유럽 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3246">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3247">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3247">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3248">20 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3248">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3249">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3249">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3250">20 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3250">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3251">10 자리 숫자-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3251">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3252">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3252">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3253">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3253">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3254">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3254">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3255">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3255">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3256">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3256">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3257">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3257">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3258">Regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3258">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3259">Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3259">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3260">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3260">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3262">ehic #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3262">ehic#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3265">finsjukförsäkringskort a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3265">finska sjukförsäkringskort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3266">건강 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3266">health card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3267">건강 보험 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3267">health insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3268">건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3268">health insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3269">hälsokort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3269">hälsokort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3270">sairaanhoitokortin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3270">sairaanhoitokortin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3271">sairausvakuutuskortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3271">sairausvakuutuskortti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3272">sairausvakuutusnumero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3272">sairausvakuutusnumero</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3274">sjukförsäkringskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3274">sjukförsäkringskort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3275">suomen sairausvakuutuskortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3275">suomen sairausvakuutuskortti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3276">terveyskortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3276">terveyskortti</span></span>


## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3277">핀란드 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3277">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3278">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3278">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3279">6 자리 숫자와 세기를 나타내는 문자 및 3 자리 숫자와 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3279">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3280">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3280">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3281">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3281">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3282">생년월일에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3282">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3283">세기 표식 ('-', ' + ' 또는 ' a ')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3283">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3284">3 자리 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3284">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3285">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3285">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3286">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3286">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3287">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3287">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3288">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3288">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3289">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3289">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3290">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3290">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3291">Keyword_finnish_national_id에서 키워드를 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3291">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3292">체크섬 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3292">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3293">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3293">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3294">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3294">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3295">체크섬 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3295">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3344">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3344">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3345">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3345">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3346">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3346">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3347">9 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3347">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3348">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3348">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3349">9 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3349">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3350">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3350">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3351">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3351">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3352">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3353">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3354">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3355">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3355">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3356">정규식 Regex_finland_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3356">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3357">Keyword_finland_passport_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3357">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3358">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3358">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3359">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3359">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3360">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3360">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3361">에이 si</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3361">Passi</span></span>


## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3362">핀란드 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3362">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3363">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3363">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3364">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3365">지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3365">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3366">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3367">다음은 지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3367">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3368">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3368">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3369">다음 중 하나의 인스턴스에 대해 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3369">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3370">더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3370">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3371">빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3371">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3372">문자 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3372">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3373">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3373">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3374">1 개의 문자 또는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3374">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3375">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3375">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3376">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3376">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3377">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3377">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3378">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3378">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3379">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3379">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3380">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3380">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3381">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3381">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3382">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3382">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3383">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3383">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3384">Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3384">Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3385">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3385">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3386">개인 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3386">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3387">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3387">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3388">핀란드어 국가 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3388">finnish national id number</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3406">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3406">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3407">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형에 서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3407">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3408">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3409">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3409">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3410">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3410">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3411">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3411">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3412">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3412">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3413">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3413">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3414">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3414">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3415">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3415">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3416">Func_french_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3416">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3417">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3417">at least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3418">Keyword_french_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3418">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3419">Func_eu_date 함수는 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3419">the function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3420">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3420">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3422">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3422">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3423">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3423">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3424">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3424">driving licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3425">driving license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3425">driving license</span></span>
