## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3431">프랑스 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3431">France health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3432">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3432">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3433">21 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3433">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3434">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3434">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3435">21 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3435">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3436">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3436">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3437">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3437">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3438">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3438">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3439">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3439">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3440">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3440">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3441">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3441">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3442">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3442">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3443">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3443">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3444">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3444">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3445">regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3445">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3446">Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3446">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3447">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3447">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3448">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3448">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3449">보험 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3449">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3450">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3450">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3451">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3451">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3452">프랑스 국가 id 카드 (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3452">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3453">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3453">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3454">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3454">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3455">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3455">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3456">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3456">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3457">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3458">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3458">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3459">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3460">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3460">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3461">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3461">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3462">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3462">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3463">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3463">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3476">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3476">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3477">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3477">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3478">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3479">9 자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3479">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3480">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3480">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3481">9 자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3481">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3482">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3482">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3483">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3483">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3484">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3484">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3485">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3485">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3486">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3486">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3487">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3487">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3488">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3488">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3489">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3489">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3490">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3490">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3511">프랑스 사회 보장 번호 (INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3511">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3512">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 및 해당 ID와 관련 된 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3512">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3513">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3513">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3514">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3514">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3515">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3515">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3516">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3516">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3517">13 자리 숫자와 공백 다음 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3517">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3518">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3518">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3519">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3519">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3520">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3521">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3521">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3522">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3523">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3523">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3524">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3524">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3525">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3525">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3526">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3526">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3527">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3527">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3528">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3528">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3529">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3529">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3530">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3530">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3556">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3556">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3557">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3558">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3558">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3559">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3560">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3560">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3561">0, 1, 2 또는 3 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3561">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3562">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3562">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3563">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3563">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3564">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3564">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3565">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3565">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3566">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3566">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3567">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3567">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3568">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3568">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3569">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3569">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3570">3 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3570">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3571">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3571">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3572">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3572">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3573">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3573">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3574">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3574">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3575">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3575">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3576">From 키워드를  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3576">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3577">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3577">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3578">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3578">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3579">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3579">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3580">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3580">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3581">numéro d'identification fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3581">numéro d'identification fiscale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3582">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3582">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3583">세금 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3583">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3584">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3584">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3585">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3585">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3586">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3586">tax no</span></span>

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3598">프랑스 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3598">France value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3599">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3599">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3600">13 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3600">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3601">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3601">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3602">13 문자 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3602">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3603">두 개의 문자-FR (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3603">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3604">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3604">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3605">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3605">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3606">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3606">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3607">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3607">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3608">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3608">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3609">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3609">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3610">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3610">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3611">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3611">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3612">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3612">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3613">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3613">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3614">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3614">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3615">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3615">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3616">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3616">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3617">Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3617">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3618">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3618">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3619">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3619">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3620">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3620">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3622">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3622">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3623">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3623">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3624">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3624">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3625">부가 세금</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3625">value added tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3626">siren id 없음 numéro d'identification taxe sur siren ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3626">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3627">taxe valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3627">taxe valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3628">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3628">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3629">n ° tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3629">n° tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3630">numéro de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3630">numéro de tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3631">numéro d'identification siren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3631">numéro d'identification siren</span></span>


## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3632">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3632">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3633">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3633">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3634">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3634">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3635">11 자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3635">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3636">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3636">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3637">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3637">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3638">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3638">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3639">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3639">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3640">6 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3640">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3641">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3641">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3642">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3642">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3643">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3643">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3644">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3644">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3645">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3645">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3646">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3646">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3647">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3647">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3648">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3648">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3649">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3649">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3650">Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3650">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3651">Keyword_german_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3651">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3652">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3652">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3745">독일 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3745">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3746">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3746">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3747">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후: 9 개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3747">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3748">1 월 1987 년 10 월 31 일 (2010:10 자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3748">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3749">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3749">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3750">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3750">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3751">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3751">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3752">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3752">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3753">1 년 4 월 1987 일 ~ 10 2010 월 31 일까 지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3753">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3754">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3754">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3755">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3755">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3756">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3756">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3757">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3757">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3758">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3758">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3759">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3759">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3760">Keyword_germany_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3760">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3762">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3762">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3766">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3766">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3767">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3767">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3768">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3768">identity card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3770">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3770">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3771">개인 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3771">personal id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3775">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3775">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3776">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3776">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3777">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3777">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3778">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3778">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3779">10 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3779">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3780">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3780">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3781">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3781">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3782">첫 번째 문자는 숫자 또는이 집합의 문자 (C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3782">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3783">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3783">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3784">이 집합의 5 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (C,-H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3784">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3785">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3785">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3786">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3786">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3787">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3787">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3788">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3788">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3789">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3789">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3790">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3790">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3791">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3791">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3792">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3792">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3793">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3793">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3794">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3794">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3795">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3795">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3796">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3814">독일 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3814">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3815">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3815">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3816">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3816">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3817">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3817">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3818">11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3818">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3819">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3819">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3820">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3820">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3821">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3821">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3822">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3822">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3823">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3823">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3824">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3824">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3825">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3825">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3826">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3826">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3827">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3827">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3828">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3828">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3829">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3829">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3830">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3830">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3831">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3831">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3832">From 키워드를  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3832">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3833">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3833">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3834">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3834">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3860">독일 값 세금 번호 추가 됨</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3860">Germany value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3861">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3861">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3862">11 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3862">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3863">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3863">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3864">11 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3864">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3865">문자 D 또는 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3865">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3866">문자 E 또는 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3866">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3867">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3867">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3868">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3868">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3869">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3869">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3870">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3870">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3871">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3871">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3872">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3872">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3873">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3874">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3874">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3875">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3876">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3876">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3877">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3877">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3878">Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3878">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3879">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3879">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3880">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3880">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3881">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3881">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3882">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3882">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3883">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3883">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3884">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3884">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3885">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3885">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3886">vat # mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3886">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3887">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3887">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3888">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3888">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3889">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3889">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3890">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3890">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3891">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3891">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3892">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3893">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3893">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3894">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3894">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3895">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3895">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3896">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3896">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3897">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3897">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3898">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3898">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3899">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3899">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3900">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3900">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3901">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3901">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3907">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3907">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3918">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3918">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3919">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3919">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3920">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3920">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3921">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3921">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3922">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3922">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3923">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3923">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3924">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3924">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3925">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3925">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3926">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3926">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3927">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3927">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3928">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3928">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3929">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3929">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3930">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3930">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3931">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3931">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3932">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3933">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3933">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3934">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3934">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3935">Keyword_greece_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3935">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3936">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3936">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3937">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3937">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3942">그리스어 개인 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3942">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3943">그리스 경찰서 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3943">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3944">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3944">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3945">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3945">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3946">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3946">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3947">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3947">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3948">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3948">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3949">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3949">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3950">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3950">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3951">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3951">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3952">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3952">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3953">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3953">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3954">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3955">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3955">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3956">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3957">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3957">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3958">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3958">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3959">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3959">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3960">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3960">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3961">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3961">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3962">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3962">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3963">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3963">greek passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3964">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3964">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3965">διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3965">διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3966">그리스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3966">Greece tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3967">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3967">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3968">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3968">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3969">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3969">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3970">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3970">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3971">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3971">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3972">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3972">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3973">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3973">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-3974">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3974">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3975">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3975">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-3976">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3976">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3977">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3977">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-3978">Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-3978">Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4005">HKID (홍콩 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4005">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4006">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4006">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4007">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4007">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4008">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4008">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4009">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4009">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4010">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4010">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4011">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4011">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4012">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4012">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4013">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4013">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4014">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4014">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4015">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4015">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4016">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4016">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4017">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4017">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4018">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4018">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4019">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4019">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4020">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4020">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4021">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4021">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4022">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4022">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4062">헝가리어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4062">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4063">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4063">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4064">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4064">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4065">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4065">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4066">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4067">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4067">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4068">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4068">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4069">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4069">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4070">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4070">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4071">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4071">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4072">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4072">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4073">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4073">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4074">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4074">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4075">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4075">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4076">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4076">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4081">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4081">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4085">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4085">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4086">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4086">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4087">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4087">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4088">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4088">driving license number</span></span>
