- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4090">vezetoi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4090">vezetoi engedely</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4091">헝가리어 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4091">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4092">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4092">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4093">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4093">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4094">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4094">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4095">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4095">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4096">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (1gb, 2 암, 기타 번호는 두 개를 포함 하는 경우 1900에만 발생 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4096">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4097">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4097">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4098">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4098">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4099">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4099">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4100">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4100">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4101">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4101">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4102">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4102">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4103">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4103">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4104">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4104">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4105">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4105">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4106">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4106">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4107">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4107">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4108">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4108">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4109">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4109">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4110">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4110">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4111">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4111">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4112">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4112">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4113">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4113">sz.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4114">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4114"> ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4115">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4115">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4116">személyazonosító igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4116">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4117">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4117">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4118">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4118">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4119">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4119">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4120">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4120">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4121">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4121">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4122">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4122">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4123">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 개 또는 7 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4123">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4124">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4125">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4125">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4126">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4127">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4128">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4128">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4129">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4129">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4130">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4130">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4131">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4131">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4132">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4132">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4133">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4133">hungarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4134">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4134">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4135">útlevél száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4135">útlevél száma</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4136">헝가리어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4136">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4137">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4137">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4138">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4138">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4139">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4139">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4140">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4140">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4141">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4141">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4142">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4143">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4143">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4144">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4145">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4145">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4146">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4146">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4147">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4147">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4148">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4148">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4149">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4149">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4150">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4150">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4169">헝가리어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4169">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4170">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4170">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4171">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4171">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4172">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4172">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4173">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4173">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4174">"8" 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4174">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4175">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4175">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4176">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4176">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4177">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4177">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4178">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4178">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4179">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4179">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4180">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4180">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4181">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4181">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4182">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4182">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4183">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4183">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4184">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4184">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4196">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4196">tax no#</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4210">헝가리 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4210">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4211">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4211">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4212">10 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4212">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4213">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4213">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4214">10 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4214">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4215">2 개의 문자-HU 또는 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4215">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4216">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4216">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4217">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4217">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4218">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4218">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4219">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4219">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4220">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4220">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4221">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4221">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4222">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4222">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4223">Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4223">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4224">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4224">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4225">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4225">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4227">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4227">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4230">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4230">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4231">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4231">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4232">hungarianvatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4232">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4233">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4233">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4234">부가 세금 áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4234">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4235">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4235">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4236">általános forgalmi adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4236">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4237">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4237">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4238">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4238">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4239">인도 (영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4239">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4240">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4240">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4241">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4241">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4242">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4242">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4243">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4243">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4244">5개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4244">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4245">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4245">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4246">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당하는 문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4246">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4247">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4248">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4248">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4249">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4250">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4250">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4251">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4251">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4252">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4252">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4253">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4253">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4254">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4254">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4255">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4255">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4256">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4256">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4257">확대</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4257">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4258">Aadhaar (인도 고유 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4258">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4259">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4259">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4260">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4260">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4261">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4261">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4262">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4262">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4263">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4263">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4264">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4264">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4265">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4265">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4266">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4266">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4267">검사 숫자에 해당하는 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4267">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4268">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4268">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4269">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4269">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4270">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4270">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4271">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4271">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4272">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4272">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4273">Keyword_india_aadhar에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4273">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4274">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4274">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4275">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4275">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4276">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4276">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4277">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4277">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4278">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4278">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4279">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4279">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4284">인도네시아 id 카드 (KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4284">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4285">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4286">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4286">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4287">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4288">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4288">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4289">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4289">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4290">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4290">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4291">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4291">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4292">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4292">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4293">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4293">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4294">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4294">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4295">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4295">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4296">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4296">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4297">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4298">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4298">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4299">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4300">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4300">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4301">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4301">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4302">Keyword_indonesia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4302">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4303">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4303">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4304">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4304">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4305">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4305">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4306">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4306">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4307">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4307">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4308">IBAN (국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4308">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4309">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4309">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4310">국가 코드 (두 문자) + 검사 숫자 (2 자리 숫자)와 bban 숫자 (최대 30 자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4310">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4311">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4311">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4312">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4312">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4313">두 글자로 된 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4313">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4314">두 개의 검사 숫자 (선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4314">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4315">1-7 개 문자 또는 숫자의 그룹 (공백으로 구분 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4315">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4316">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4316">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4317">각 국가의 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4317">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4318">IBAN 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음과 같은 60 국가를 포함 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4318">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4319">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, to, do, ee, es, fi,,, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, kw, il, vg,, nl-nl, tn,,,,,,,,, ,,,,,,,,,,,,, rs, l, se, si,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4319">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4320">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4320">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4321">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4321">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4322">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4322">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4323">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4323">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4324">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4324">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4325">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4325">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4326">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4326">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4327">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4327">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4328">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4328">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4329">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4330">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4330">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4331">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4332">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4332">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4333">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4333">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4334">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4334">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4335">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4335">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4336">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4336">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4337">Dictionary_icd_10_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4337">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4338">Dictionary_icd_10_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4338">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4339">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4339">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4340">업데이트 된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4340">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4341">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4341">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4342">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4342">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4343">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4343">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4344">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4344">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4345">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4345">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4346">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4346">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4347">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4347">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4348">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4348">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4349">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4349">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4350">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4350">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4351">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4351">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4352">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4352">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4353">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4353">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4354">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4354">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4355">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4355">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4356">Dictionary_icd_9_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4356">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4357">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4357">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4358">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4358">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4359">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4359">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4360">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4360">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4361">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4361">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4362">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4362">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4363">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4363">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4364">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4364">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4365">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4365">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4366">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4366">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4367">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는 버전(마침표 있음) 및 서식 없는 버전(마침표 없음)으로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4367">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4368">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4368">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4369">서식 있는(콜론 포함) IPv6 번호로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4369">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4370">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4370">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4371">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4372">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4372">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4373">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4374">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4374">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4375">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4375">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4376">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4376">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4377">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4377">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4378">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4378">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4379">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4379">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4380">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4380">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4381">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4381">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4382">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4382">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4383">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4383">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4384">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4384">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4385">IP(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4385">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4386">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4386">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4387">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4387">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4388">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4388">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4389">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4389">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4390">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4390">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4391">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4391">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4392">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4393">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4393">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4394">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4395">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4395">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4396">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4396">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4397">4 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4397">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4398">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4398">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4399">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4399">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4400">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4400">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4401">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4401">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4402">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4402">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4403">From 키워드를  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4403">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4404">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4404">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4405">Keywords_ireland_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4405">Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4408">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4408">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4409">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4409">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4410">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4410">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4411">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4411">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4412">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4412">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4413">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4413">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4414">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4414">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4415">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4415">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4416">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4416">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4417">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4417">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4419">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4419">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4420">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4420">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4421">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4421">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4422">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4422">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4423">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4423">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4424">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4424">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4425">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4425">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4426">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4426">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4427">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4427">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4428">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4428">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4429">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4429">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4430">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4430">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4431">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4431">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4432">From 키워드를  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4432">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4433">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4433">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4434">Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4434">Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4435">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4435">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4436">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4436">irish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4437">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4437">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4438">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4438">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4439">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4439">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4440">포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4440">passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4441">포트 numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4441">passeport numero</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4442">아일랜드 PPS (개인 공개 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4442">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4443">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4444">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4444">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4445">7 자리 숫자와 1-2 자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4445">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4446">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4446">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4447">7 자리 숫자와 2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4447">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4448">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4448">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4449">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4449">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4450">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4450">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4451">1 ~ 2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4451">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4452">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4452">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4453">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4453">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4454">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당 하는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4454">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4455">A-I 범위의 선택적 문자 또는 "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4455">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4456">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4457">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4458">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4459">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4459">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4460">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4460">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4461">Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4461">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4462">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4462">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4463">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4463">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4464">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4464">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4465">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
