## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4510">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4510">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4511">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4511">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4512">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4512">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4513">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4513">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4514">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4514">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4515">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4515">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4516">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4516">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4517">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4517">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4518">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4518">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4519">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4519">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4520">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4520">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4521">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4521">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4522">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4523">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4523">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4524">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4525">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4525">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4526">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4526">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4527">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4527">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4528">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4528">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4529">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4529">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4530">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4530">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4531">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4531">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4532">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4532">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4533">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4533">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4534">이스라엘 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4534">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4535">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4536">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4536">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4537">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4537">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4538">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4538">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4539">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4540">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4540">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4541">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4542">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4542">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4543">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4543">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4544">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4544">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4545">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4545">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4546">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4546">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4547">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4547">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4548">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4548">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4549">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4549">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4550">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4550">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4551">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4551">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4552">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4553">10 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4553">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4554">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4554">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4555">10 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4555">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4556">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4556">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4557">문자 "A" 또는 "V" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4557">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4558">7 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자 또는 밑줄 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4558">seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4559">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4559">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4560">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4560">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4561">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4561">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4562">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4562">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4563">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4563">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4564">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4564">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4565">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4565">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4566">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4566">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4567">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4567">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4568">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4568">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4569">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4569">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4570">이탈리아 회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4570">Italy fiscal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4571">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4571">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4572">지정 된 패턴에 해당 하는 문자 및 숫자의 16 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4572">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4573">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4573">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4574">문자와 숫자의 16 자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4574">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4575">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4575">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4576">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4576">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4577">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4577">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4578">출생 월의 문자에 해당 하는 한 문자는 알파벳 순서로 사용 되지만 1 ~ E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자를 사용 하는 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4578">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4579">genders를 구분 하기 위해 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자 (40)가 여성 생년월일에 추가 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4579">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4580">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (국가 전체 코드는 외국 국가에 사용 됨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4580">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4581">1 개의 패리티 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4581">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4582">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4582">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4583">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4583">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4584">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4584">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4585">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4585">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4586">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4586">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4587">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4587">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4588">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4588">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4589">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4589">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4599">numero id personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4599">numero id personale</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4607">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4624">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4624">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4625">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4625">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4626">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4626">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4627">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4627">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4628">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4628">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4629">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4629">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4630">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4630">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4631">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4631">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4632">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4632">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4633">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4633">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4634">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4634">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4635">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4635">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4636">정규식이 해당  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4636">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4637">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4637">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4638">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4638">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4649">이탈리아 값 세금 번호 추가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4649">Italy value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4650">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4651">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4651">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4652">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4653">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4653">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4654">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4654">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4655">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4655">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4656">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4656">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4657">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4657">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4658">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4659">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4659">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4660">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4661">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4661">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4662">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4662">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4663">Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4663">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4664">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4664">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4665">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4665">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4667">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4667">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4673">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4673">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4674">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4675">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4675">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4676">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4677">은행 계좌 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4677">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4678">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4678">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4679">은행 계좌 분기 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4679">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4680">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4680">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4681">공백 또는 대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4681">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4682">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4682">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4683">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4683">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4684">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4684">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4685">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4685">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4686">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4686">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4687">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4687">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4688">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4688">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4689">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4689">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4690">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4690">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4691">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4691">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4692">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4692">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4693">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4693">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4694">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4694">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4753">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4753">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4754">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4755">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4755">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4756">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4756">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4757">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4757">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4758">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4759">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4759">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4760">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4761">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4761">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4762">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4762">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4763">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4763">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4791">일본 내 번호-회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4791">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4792">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4793">13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4793">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4794">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4794">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4795">13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4795">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4796">1 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4796">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4797">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4797">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4798">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4798">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4799">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4799">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4800">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4800">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4801">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4801">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4802">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4802">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4803">Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4803">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4804">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4804">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4805">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4805">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4812">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4812">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4818">일본 내 번호-개인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4818">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4819">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4820">12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4820">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4821">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4822">12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4822">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4823">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4823">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4824">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4824">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4825">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4825">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4826">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4826">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4827">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4827">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4828">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4829">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4829">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4830">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4831">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4831">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4832">Func_japanese_my_number_personal 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4832">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4833">Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4833">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4834">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4834">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4835">Func_japanese_my_number_personal 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4835">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4836">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4836">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4837">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4837">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4838">내 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4838">my number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4839">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4839">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4840">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4840">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4841">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4841">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4842">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4842">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4843">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4843">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4844">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4844">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4845">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4845">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4846">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4846">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4847">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4847">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4848">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4848">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4849">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4849">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4850">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4850">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4851">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4851">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4852">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4852">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4853">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4853">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4854">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4854">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4855">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4855">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4856">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4856">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4857">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4857">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4858">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4858">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4859">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4859">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4860">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4860">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4861">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4861">パスポート</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4862">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4862">パスポート番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4863">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4863">パスポートのNum</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4864">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4864">パスポート＃</span></span> 

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4865">일본 거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4865">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4866">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4866">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4867">12 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4867">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4868">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4868">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4869">12 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4869">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4870">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4870">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4871">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4871">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4872">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4872">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4873">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4874">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4875">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4876">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4876">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4877">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4877">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4878">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4878">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4879">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4879">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4880">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4880">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4881">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4881">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4882">거주지 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4882">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4883">거주지 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4883">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4884">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4884">在留カード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4885">일본 상주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4885">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4886">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4886">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4887">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4887">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4888">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4888">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4889">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4889">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4890">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4890">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4891">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4891">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4892">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4892">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4893">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4893">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4894">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4894">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4895">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4895">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4896">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4896">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4897">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4897">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4898">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4898">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4899">Resident Register Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4899">Resident Register Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4900">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4900">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4901">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4901">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4902">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4902">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4903">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4903">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4904">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4904">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4906">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4906">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4909">일본 SIN (사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4909">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4910">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4910">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4911">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4911">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4912">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4912">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4913">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4913">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4914">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4914">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4915">하이픈 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4915">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4916">6 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4916">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4917">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4917">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4918">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4918">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4919">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4919">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4920">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4920">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4921">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4921">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4922">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4922">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4923">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4923">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4924">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4924">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4925">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4925">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4926">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4926">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4927">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4927">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4928">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4928">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4929">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4929">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4930">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4930">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4931">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4931">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4932">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4932">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4933">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4933">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4934">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4934">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4935">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4935">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4936">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4936">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4937">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4937">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4938">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4938">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4939">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4939">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4940">3 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4940">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4941">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4941">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4942">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4942">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4943">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4943">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4944">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4944">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4945">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4945">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4946">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4946">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4947">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4947">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4952">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4952">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4953">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4953">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4954">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4954">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4959">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4959">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4960">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4960">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4963">라트비아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4963">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4964">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4964">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4965">11 자리 숫자와 선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4965">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4966">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4966">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4967">이전 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4967">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4968">11 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4968">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4969">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4969">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4970">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4970">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4971">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (19th 세기의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4971">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4972">임의로 생성 되는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4972">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4973">새 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4973">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4974">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4974">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4975">두 자리 숫자 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4975">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4976">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4976">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4977">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4977">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4978">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4978">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-4979">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4979">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4980">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4980">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4981">Function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 또는 regex에서 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4981">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4982">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4982">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-4983">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4983">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-4984">Function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 또는 regex에서 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-4984">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5046">시킵니다 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5046">voter’s number</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5047">라트비아, 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5047">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5048">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5048">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5049">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5049">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5050">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5050">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5051">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5051">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5052">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5052">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5053">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5053">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5054">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5054">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5055">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5055">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5056">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5056">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5057">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5057">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5058">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5058">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5059">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5059">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5060">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5060">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5061">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5061">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5062">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5062">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5063">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5063">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5064">라트비아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5064">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5065">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5065">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5066">pase numurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5066">pase numurs</span></span>    


## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5067">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5067">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5068">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5068">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5069">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5069">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5070">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5070">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5071">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5071">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5072">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5072">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5073">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5073">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5074">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5074">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5075">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5075">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5076">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5076">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5077">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5077">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5078">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5078">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5094">리투아니아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5094">Lithuania personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5095">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5095">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5096">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5096">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5097">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5097">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5098">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5098">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5099">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 (1-6)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5099">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5100">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5100">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5101">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5101">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5102">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5102">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5103">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5103">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5104">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5104">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5105">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5105">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5106">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5106">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5107">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5107">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5108">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5108">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5109">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5109">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5110">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5110">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5121">개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5121">personal code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5123">piliečio paslaugos numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5123">piliečio paslaugos numeris</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5124">tax id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5127">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5127">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5128">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5128">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5129">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5129">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5130">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5130">tax registration number</span></span>
