## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5145">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5145">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5146">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5146">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5147">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5148">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5148">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5149">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5150">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5150">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5151">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5152">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5152">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5153">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5154">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5154">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5155">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5155">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5156">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5156">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5157">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5157">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5158">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5158">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5159">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5159">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5160">lithunian 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5160">lithunian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5161">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5161">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5162">numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5162">paso numeris</span></span>


## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5163">룩셈부르크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5163">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5164">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5164">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5165">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5165">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5166">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5166">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5167">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5167">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5168">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5168">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5169">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5170">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5170">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5171">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5172">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5172">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5173">정규식이 해당  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5173">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5174">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5174">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5175">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5175">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5180">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5180">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5186">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5186">driver's licence number</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5190">룩셈부르크 국내 식별 번호 (자연어)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5190">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5191">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5192">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5192">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5193">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5194">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5194">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5195">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5195">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5196">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5196">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5197">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5197">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5198">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5198">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5199">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5199">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5200">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5200">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5201">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5201">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5202">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5202">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5203">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5203">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5204">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5204">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5218">개인 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5218">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5219">개인 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5219">personal identification</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5227">룩셈부르크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5227">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5228">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5228">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5229">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5229">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5230">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5230">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5231">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5231">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5232">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5232">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5233">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5234">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5234">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5235">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5236">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5236">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5237">정규식이 해당  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5237">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5238">From 키워드를  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5238">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5239">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5239">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_nation_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5240">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5240">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5241">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5241">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5242">라트비아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5242">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5243">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5243">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5244">passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5244">passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5245">룩셈부르크 국내 식별 번호 (비 자연적인 사람)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5245">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5246">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5246">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5247">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5247">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5248">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5248">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5249">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5249">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5250">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5250">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5251">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5251">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5252">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5252">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5253">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5253">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5254">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5254">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5255">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5255">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5256">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5256">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5257">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5257">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5258">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5258">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5259">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5259">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5260">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5260">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5261">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5261">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5262">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5262">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5263">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5263">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5264">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5264">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5265">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5265">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5305">말레이시아 식별 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5305">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5306">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5306">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5307">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5307">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5308">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5308">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5309">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5309">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5310">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5310">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5311">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5311">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5312">두 글자로 된 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5312">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5313">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5313">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5314">임의의 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5314">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5315">1 자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5315">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5316">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5316">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5317">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5317">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5318">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5318">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5319">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5319">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5320">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5320">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5321">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5321">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5322">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5322">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_malaysia_id_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5323">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5323">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5324">디지털 응용 프로그램 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5324">digital application card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5325">i/c</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5325">i/c</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5327">비용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5327">ic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5328">ic 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5328">ic no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5329">id card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5329">id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5330">식별 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5330">identification Card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5331">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5331">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5332">k/p</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5332">k/p</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5333">k/p 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5333">k/p no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5334">kad akuan diri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5334">kad akuan diri</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5335">kad aplikasi 디지털</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5335">kad aplikasi digital</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5336">kad pengenalan 말레이시아</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5336">kad pengenalan malaysia</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5337">kp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5337">kp</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5338">kp 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5338">kp no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5339">mykad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5339">mykad</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5340">mykas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5340">mykas</span></span>

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5348">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5348">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5349">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5349">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5350">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5350">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5351">지정 된 패턴에서 두 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5351">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5352">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5352">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5353">두 문자와 6 자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5353">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5354">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5354">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5355">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5355">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5356">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5356">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5357">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5357">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5358">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5358">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5359">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5360">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5360">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5361">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5362">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5362">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5363">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5363">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5364">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5364">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5365">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5365">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5366">Keywords_malta_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5366">Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5367">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5367">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5368">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5368">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5369">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5369">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5370">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5370">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5371">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5371">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5372">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5372">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5373">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5373">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5374">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5374">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5375">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5375">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5376">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5376">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5377">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5377">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5378">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5378">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5379">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5379">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span></span>

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5380">몰타 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5380">Malta identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5381">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5381">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5382">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5382">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5383">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5383">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5384">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5384">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5385">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5385">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5386">"M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z"의 한 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5386">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5387">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5387">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5388">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5388">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5389">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5389">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5390">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5390">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5391">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5391">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5392">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5392">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5393">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5393">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5394">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5394">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5399">identifika numru tal-biljett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5399">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5400">kodiċi numerali personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5400">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5401">numru ta ' personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5401">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5402">numru ta ' taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5402">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5403">numru ta ' uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5403">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5404">numru ta ' uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5404">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5405">numru taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5405">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5406">numru tat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5406">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5407">개인 숫자 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5407">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5408">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5408">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5409">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5409">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5410">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5410">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5411">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5411">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5412">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5412">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5413">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5414">공백이 나 구분 기호 없이 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5414">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5415">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5416">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5416">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5417">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5418">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5418">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5419">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5420">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5420">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5421">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5421">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5422">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5422">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5423">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5423">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5424">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5424">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5425">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5425">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5426">몰타어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5426">maltese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5427">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5427">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5428">numru-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5428">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5429">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5429">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5430">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5430">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5431">몰타어 nationals의 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5431">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5432">지정 된 패턴에서 일곱 자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5432">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5433">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5433">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5434">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5434">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5435">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5435">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5436">몰타어 nationals: 7 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5436">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5437">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5437">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5438">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5438">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5439">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5439">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5440">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5440">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5441">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5441">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5442">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5442">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5443">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5443">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5444">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5444">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5445">Regex로  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  가져오거나 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5445">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5446">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5446">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5447">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5447">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5448">Regex로  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 가져오거나 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5448">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5481">네덜란드 시민 서비스 (BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5481">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5482">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5482">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5483">선택 공백이 포함 된 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5483">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5484">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5484">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5485">8-9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5485">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5486">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5486">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5487">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5487">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5488">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5488">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5489">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5489">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5490">2-3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5490">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5491">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5492">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5492">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5493">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5494">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5494">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5495">Func_netherlands_bsn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5495">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5496">Keyword_netherlands_bsn에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5496">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5497">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5497">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5500">bsn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5500">bsn#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5503">시민 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5503">citizen service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5504">사용자 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5504">person number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5505">개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5505">personal number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5506">개인 숫자 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5506">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5507">사용자 관련 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5507">person-related number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5508">persoonlijk nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5508">persoonlijk nummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5510">persoonsgebonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5510">persoonsgebonden</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5511">persoonsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5511">persoonsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5512">사회 aal-fiscaal nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5512">sociaal-fiscaal nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5513">사회적-회계 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5513">social-fiscal number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5514">sofi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5514">sofi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5515">sofinummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5515">sofinummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5516">identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5516">uniek identificatienummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5517">identiteitsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5517">uniek identiteitsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5518">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5518">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5519">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5519">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5520">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5520">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5521">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5521">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5522">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5522">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5523">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5524">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5524">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5525">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5525">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5526">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5526">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5527">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5527">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5528">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5528">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5529">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5529">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5530">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5530">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5531">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5531">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5532">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5532">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5550">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5550">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5551">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5551">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5552">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5553">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5553">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5554">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5554">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5555">9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5555">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5556">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5557">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5557">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5558">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5559">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5559">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5560">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5560">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5561">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5561">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5562">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5562">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5563">Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5563">Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5564">네덜란드어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5564">dutch passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5565">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5565">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5566">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5566">netherlands passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5567">nederlanden, nummer ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5567">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5568">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5568">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5569">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5569">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5570">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5570">paspoortnummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5571">네덜란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5571">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5572">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5572">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5573">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5573">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5574">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5574">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5575">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5575">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5576">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5576">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5577">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5577">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5578">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5578">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5579">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5579">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5580">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5580">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5581">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5581">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5582">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5582">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5583">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5583">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5621">네덜란드 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5621">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5622">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5623">14 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5623">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5624">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5625">14 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5625">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5626">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5626">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5627">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5627">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5628">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5628">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5629">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5629">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5630">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5630">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5631">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5631">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5632">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5632">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5633">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5633">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5634">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5634">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5635">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5635">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5636">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5636">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5637">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5637">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5638">Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5638">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5639">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5639">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5640">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5640">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5649">뉴질랜드 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5649">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5650">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5651">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14-16 자리 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5651">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5652">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5653">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14 ~ 16 자리 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5653">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5654">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5654">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5655">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5655">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5656">3 ~ 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5656">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5657">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5657">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5658">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5658">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5659">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5659">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5660">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5660">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5661">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5661">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5662">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5662">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5663">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5663">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5664">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5664">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5665">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5665">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5666">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5666">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5667">Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5667">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5668">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5668">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5669">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5669">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5677">새 뉴질랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5677">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5678">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5678">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5679">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5679">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5680">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5680">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5681">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5681">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5682">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5682">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5683">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5683">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5684">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5684">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5685">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5685">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5686">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5686">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5687">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5687">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5688">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5688">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5689">Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5689">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5690">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5690">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5691">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5691">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5758">뉴질랜드 inland 수입 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5758">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5759">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5759">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5760">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 8 개 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5760">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5761">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5761">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5762">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 8 개 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5762">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5763">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5763">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5764">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5764">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5765">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5765">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5766">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5766">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5767">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5767">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5768">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5769">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5769">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5770">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5771">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5771">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5772">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5772">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5773">Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5773">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5774">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5774">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5775">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5775">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5776">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5776">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5778">ird 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5778">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5779">ird 아니요 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5779">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5780">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5780">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5781">뉴질랜드 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5781">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5782">ird 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5782">ird number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5784">뉴질랜드 보건부 (생명 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5784">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5785">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5785">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5786">3 개의 문자, 공백 (선택 사항) 및 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5786">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5787">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5787">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5788">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 공백 (선택 사항) 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5788">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5789">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5790">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5790">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5791">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5792">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5793">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5793">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5794">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5794">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5795">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5795">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5796">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5796">Keywords</span></span>
