- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5801">처리가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5801">treatment</span></span> 


## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5802">뉴질랜드 공유 wlefare 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5802">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5803">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5803">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5804">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5804">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5805">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5805">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5806">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5806">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5807">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5807">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5808">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5808">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5809">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5809">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5810">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5810">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5811">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5811">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5812">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5812">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5813">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5813">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5814">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5814">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5815">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5815">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5816">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5816">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5817">Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5817">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5818">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5818">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5819">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5819">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5820">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5820">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5821">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5821">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5822">소셜 welfare #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5822">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5823">소셜 welfare #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5823">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5824">소셜 welfare No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5824">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5825">소셜 welfare 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5825">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5826">swn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5826">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5827">노르웨이 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5827">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5828">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5828">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5829">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5829">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5830">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5830">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5831">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5831">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5832">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5832">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5833">3 자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5833">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5834">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5834">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5835">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5835">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5836">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5836">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5837">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5837">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5838">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5838">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5839">Func_norway_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5839">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5840">Keyword_norway_id_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5840">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5841">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5841">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5842">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5842">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5843">Func_norway_id_numbe 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5843">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5844">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5844">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5853">필리핀 통합 다목적 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5853">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5854">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5854">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5855">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5855">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5856">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5856">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5857">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5857">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5858">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5858">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5859">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5859">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5860">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5860">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5861">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5861">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5862">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5862">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5863">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5863">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5864">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5864">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5865">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5865">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5866">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5866">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5867">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5867">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5868">Keyword_philippines_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5868">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5869">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5869">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5870">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5870">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5871">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5871">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5872">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5872">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5873">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5873">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5874">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5874">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5875">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5875">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5876">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5876">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5877">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5877">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5878">두 개의 슬래시를 포함 하는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5878">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5879">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5879">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5880">14 자리 숫자와 2 개의 슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5880">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5881">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5881">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5882">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5882">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5883">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5883">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5884">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5884">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5885">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5885">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5886">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5886">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5887">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5887">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5888">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5888">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5889">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5889">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5890">정규식이 해당  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5890">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5891">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5891">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5892">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5892">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5893">Keywords_poland_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5893">Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5894">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5894">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5896">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5896">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5897">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5897">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5898">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5898">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5899">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5899">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5900">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5900">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5901">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5901">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5902">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5902">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5903">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5903">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5904">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5904">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5905">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5905">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5906">prawo jazdy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5906">prawo jazdy</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5907">폴란드 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5907">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5908">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5908">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5909">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5909">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5910">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5910">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5911">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5911">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5912">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5912">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5913">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5913">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5914">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5914">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5915">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5915">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5916">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5916">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5917">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5917">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5918">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5918">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5919">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5919">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5920">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5920">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5921">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5921">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5922">U r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5922">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5923">Nazwa i u r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5923">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5924">Nazwa i veiligheid dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5924">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5925">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5925">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5926">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5926">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5927">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5927">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5928">르.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5928">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5929">폴란드 국가 ID (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5929">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5930">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5930">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5931">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5931">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5932">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5932">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5933">YYMMDD 형식의 출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5933">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5934">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5934">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5935">1 개 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5935">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5936">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5937">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5937">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5938">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5939">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5939">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5940">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5940">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5941">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5941">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5942">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5942">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5943">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5943">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5944">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5944">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5945">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5945">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5946">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5946">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5947">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5947">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5948">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5948">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5949">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5949">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5950">niepowtarzalny u r i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5950">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5951">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5951">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5952">veiligheid.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5952">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5953">veiligheid-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5953">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5954">u r i identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5954">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5955">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5955">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5956">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5956">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5957">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5957">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5958">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5958">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5959">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5959">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5960">2 개의 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5960">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5961">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5961">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5962">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5962">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5963">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5963">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5964">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5964">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5965">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5965">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5966">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5966">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5967">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5967">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5968">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5968">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5969">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5969">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5970">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5970">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5971">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5971">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5972">U r i (zportu)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5972">Numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5973">Veiligheid.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5973">Nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5974">고 zportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5974">Paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5975">고 zport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5975">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5976">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5976">Poland REGON number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5977">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5977">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5978">9 자리 또는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5978">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5979">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5980">9 자리 숫자 또는 14 자리 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5980">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5981">9 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5981">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5982">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5982">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5983">슬래시나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5983">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5984">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5984">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5985">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5985">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5986">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5986">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-5987">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5987">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5988">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5988">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5989">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5989">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5990">Keywords_polish_regon_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5990">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-5991">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5991">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5992">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5992">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5995">id가 regon입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5995">regon id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5997">통계 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5997">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5998">통계적 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5998">statistical no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-5999">regon 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-5999">regon number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6001">regonno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6001">regonno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6002">회사 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6002">company id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6004">companyidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6004">companyidno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6006">numeru regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6006">numeru regon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6007">numerstatystyczny #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6007">numerstatystyczny#</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6009">폴란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6009">Poland tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6010">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6010">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6011">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6011">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6012">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6012">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6013">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6013">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6014">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6014">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6015">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6015">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6016">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6016">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6017">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6017">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6018">이 함수는 해당  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6018">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6019">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6019">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6049">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6049">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6050">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6050">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6051">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6051">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6052">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6052">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6053">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6053">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6054">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6054">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6055">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6055">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6056">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6056">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6057">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6057">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6058">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6058">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6059">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6059">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6079">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6079">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6080">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6080">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6081">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6081">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6082">두 개의 문자와 지정 된 패턴에 있는 일곱 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6082">two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6083">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6083">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6084">두 문자 다음에 특수 문자를 사용한 7 개의 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6084">two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6085">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6085">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6086">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6086">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6087">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6087">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6088">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6088">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6089">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6089">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6090">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6090">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6091">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6091">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6092">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6092">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6093">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6093">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6094">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6094">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6095">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6095">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6101">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6101">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6105">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6105">driver's license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6107">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6107">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6108">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6108">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6111">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6111">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6112">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6112">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6113">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6114">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6114">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6115">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6116">1 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6116">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6117">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6117">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6118">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6118">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6119">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6120">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6120">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6121">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6122">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6122">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6123">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6123">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6124">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6124">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6125">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6125">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6126">Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6126">Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6127">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6127">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6128">포르투갈어 passport 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6128">portuguese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6129">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6129">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6130">número do passaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6130">número do passaporte</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6131">포르투갈 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6131">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6132">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6133">선택 공백이 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6133">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6134">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6134">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6135">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6135">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6136">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6136">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6137">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6137">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6138">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6138">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6139">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6139">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6140">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6140">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6141">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6141">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6142">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6142">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6143">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6143">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6144">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6144">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6145">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6145">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6146">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6146">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6147">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6147">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6159">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6159">tax no#</span></span>

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6172">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6172">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6173">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6173">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6174">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6175">한 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6175">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6176">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6177">1 개의 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6177">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6178">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6178">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6179">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6179">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6180">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6181">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6181">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6182">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6183">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6183">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6184">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6184">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6185">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6185">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6186">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6186">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_romania_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6187">Keywords_romania_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6187">Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6189">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6189">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6190">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6190">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6191">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6191">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6192">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6192">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6193">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6193">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6194">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6194">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6195">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6195">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6196">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6196">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6197">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6197">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6198">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6198">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6199">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6199">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6200">permis de conducere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6200">permis de conducere</span></span>

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6201">루마니아 p (personal numeric code)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6201">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6202">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6202">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6203">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6203">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6204">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6204">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6205">1 자리 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6205">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6206">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6206">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6207">2 자리 숫자 (01-52 또는 99 일 수 있음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6207">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6208">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6208">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6209">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6209">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6210">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6210">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6211">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6211">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6212">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6212">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6213">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6213">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6214">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6214">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6215">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6215">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6216">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6216">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6267">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6267">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6268">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6268">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6269">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6269">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6270">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6270">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6271">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6271">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6272">8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6272">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6273">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6273">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6274">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6274">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6275">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6275">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6276">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6276">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6277">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6277">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6278">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6278">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6279">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6279">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6285">러시아 (국내) 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6285">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6286">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6287">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6287">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6288">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6289">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6289">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6290">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6290">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6291">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6291">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6292">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6292">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6293">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6293">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6294">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6294">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6295">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6295">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6296">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6296">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6297">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6297">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6298">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6298">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6299">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6299">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6300">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6300">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6317">러시아 (국제) 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6317">Russia passport number international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6318">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6319">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6319">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6320">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6320">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6321">9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6321">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6322">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6322">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6323">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6323">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6324">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6324">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6325">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6325">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6326">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6326">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6327">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6327">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6328">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6328">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6329">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6329">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6330">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6330">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6347">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6347">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6348">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6348">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6349">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6349">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6350">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6350">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6351">10 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6351">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6352">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6353">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6354">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6355">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6355">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6356">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6356">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6357">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6357">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6358">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6358">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6364">싱가포르 NRIC (국가 등록 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6364">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6365">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6365">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6366">9 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6366">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6367">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6367">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6368">9 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6368">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6369">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6369">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6370">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6370">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6371">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6371">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6372">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6372">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6373">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6373">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6374">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6374">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6375">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6375">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6376">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6376">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6377">Keyword_singapore_nric에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6377">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6378">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6378">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6379">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6379">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6380">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6380">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6381">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6381">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6392">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6392">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6393">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6393">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6394">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6394">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6395">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6395">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6396">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6396">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6397">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6397">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6398">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6398">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6399">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6399">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6400">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6401">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6401">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6402">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6403">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6403">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6404">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6404">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6405">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6405">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
