## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6421">슬로바키아 개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6421">Slovakia personal number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6422">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6422">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6423">선택적 백슬래시를 포함 하는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6423">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6424">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6424">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6425">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6425">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6426">선택적 슬래시 (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6426">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6427">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6427">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6428">1 개의 선택적 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6428">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6429">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6430">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6430">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6431">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6432">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6432">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6433">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6433">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6434">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6434">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6435">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6435">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6436">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6436">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6483">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6483">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6484">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6484">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6485">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6486">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자 다음에 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6486">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6487">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6488">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6488">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6489">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6489">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6490">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6490">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6491">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6491">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6492">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6492">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6493">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6493">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6494">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6494">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6495">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6495">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6496">Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6496">Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6497">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6497">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6498">슬로바키아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6498">slovakian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6499">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6499">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6500">číslo (u)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6500">číslo pasu</span></span>


## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6501">슬로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6501">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6502">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6502">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6503">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6503">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6504">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6504">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6505">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6505">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6506">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6506">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6507">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6507">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6508">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6508">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6509">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6509">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6510">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6510">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6511">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6511">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6512">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6512">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6513">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6513">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6514">Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6514">Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6515">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6515">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6516">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6516">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6517">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6517">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6518">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6518">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6519">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6519">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6523">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6523">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6524">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6524">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6525">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6525">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6528">슬로베니아 고유 마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6528">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6529">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6529">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6530">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6530">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6531">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6531">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6532">지정 된 패턴의 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6532">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6533">생년월일 (DDMMLLL)에 해당 하는 7 자리 숫자 이며 "LLL"은 출생 연도의 마지막 세 자리에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6533">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6534">출생 "50" 영역에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6534">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6535">같은 날에 태어난 사용자의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자 (남성는 000-499, 암은 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6535">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6536">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6536">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6537">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6537">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6538">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6538">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6539">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6539">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6540">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6540">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6541">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6541">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6542">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6542">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6543">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6543">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6544">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6544">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6572">슬로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6572">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6573">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6573">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6574">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6574">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6575">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6575">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6576">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6576">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6577">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6577">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6578">"P" 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6578">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6579">대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6579">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6580">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6580">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6581">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6582">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6582">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6583">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6584">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6584">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6585">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6585">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6586">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6586">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6587">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6587">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6588">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6588">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6589">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6589">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6590">슬로베니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6590">slovenian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6591">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6591">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6592">številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6592">številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6593">슬로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6593">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6594">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6594">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6595">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6595">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6596">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6596">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6597">1-9의 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6597">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6598">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6598">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6599">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6599">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6600">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6600">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6601">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6601">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6602">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6602">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6603">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6603">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6604">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6604">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6605">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6605">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6606">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6606">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6607">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6607">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6608">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6608">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6609">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6609">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6610">davčna številka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6610">davčna številka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6611">identifikacijska številka davka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6611">identifikacijska številka davka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6612">številka davčne datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6612">številka davčne datoteke</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6613">세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6613">tax file no</span></span>

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6631">남아프리카 공화국 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6631">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6632">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6632">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6633">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6633">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6634">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6634">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6635">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6635">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6636">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6636">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6637">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6637">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6638">1 자리 참여 지표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6638">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6639">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6639">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6640">체크섬 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6640">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6641">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6641">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6642">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6642">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6643">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6643">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6644">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6644">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6645">Func_south_africa_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6645">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6646">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6646">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6647">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6647">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6653">대한민국 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6653">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6654">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6654">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6655">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6655">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6656">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6656">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6657">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6657">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6658">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6658">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6659">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6659">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6660">세기 및 성별에 따라 결정 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6660">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6661">4 자리 출생 지역 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6661">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6662">이전 번호가 동일한 사람을 구분 하는 데 사용 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6662">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6663">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6663">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6664">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6664">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6665">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6665">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6666">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6666">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6667">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6667">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6668">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6668">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6669">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6669">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6670">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6670">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6671">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6671">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6672">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6672">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6673">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6673">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6675">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6675">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6678">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6678">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6679">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6679">RRN</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6681">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6681">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6682">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6682">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6683">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6684">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6684">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6685">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6686">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6686">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6687">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6687">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6688">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6688">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6689">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6690">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6690">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6691">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6692">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6692">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6693">이 함수는 해당  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6693">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6694">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6694">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6709">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6709">driver license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6712">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6712">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6713">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6713">driver's license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6717">제어 허용 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6717">driving permit number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6718">permiso de conducción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6718">permiso de conducción</span></span>

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6731">스페인 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6731">Spain DNI</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6732">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6733">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6733">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6734">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6735">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6735">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6736">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6736">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6737">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6737">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6738">1 개의 확인 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6738">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6739">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6739">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6740">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6740">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6741">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6741">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6742">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6742">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6743">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6743">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6744">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6744">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6745">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6745">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6746">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6746">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6756">보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6756">insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6757">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6757">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6758">국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6758">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6759">nationalid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6759">nationalid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6760">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6760">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6761">nie #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6761">nie#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6762">nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6762">nie</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6765">número nacional identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6765">número nacional identidad</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6766">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6766">personal identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6768">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6768">unique identity number</span></span>

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6770">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6770">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6771">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6771">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6772">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6772">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6773">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 문자 및 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6773">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6774">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6774">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6775">문자와 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자리 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6775">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6776">두 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6776">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6777">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6777">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6778">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6778">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6779">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6779">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6780">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6780">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6781">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6781">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6782">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6782">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6783">정규식이 해당  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6783">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6784">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6784">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6785">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6785">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6786">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6786">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6789">passport 책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6789">passport book</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6790">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6790">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6791">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6791">passport no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6793">número pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6793">número pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6794">españa pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6794">españa pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6795">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6795">pasaporte</span></span>


## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6796">스페인 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6796">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6797">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6797">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6798">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6798">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6799">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6799">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6800">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6800">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6801">11-12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6801">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6802">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6802">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6803">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6803">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6804">7 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6804">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6805">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6805">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6806">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6806">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6807">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6807">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6808">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6808">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6809">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6809">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6810">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6810">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6811">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6811">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6812">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6812">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6813">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6813">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6814">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6814">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6815">스페인 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6815">Spain tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6816">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6816">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6817">지정 된 패턴에 7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 한 가지 또는 두 개의 문자가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6817">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6818">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6819">스페인 국내 Id 카드가 있는 스페인어 (자연 사용자):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6819">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6820">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6820">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6821">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6821">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6822">스페인 국가 Id 카드가 없는 상주 하지 않는 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6822">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6823">1 개의 대문자 "L" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6823">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6824">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6824">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6825">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6825">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6826">스페인 국가 Id 카드를 사용 하지 않고 14 년 동안 상주 하는 Spaniards:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6826">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6827">1 개의 대문자 "K" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6827">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6828">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6828">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6829">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6829">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6830">Foreigner의 식별 번호를 사용 하는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6830">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6831">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z" (대/소문자 구분)의 대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6831">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6832">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6832">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6833">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6833">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6834">Foreigner의 Id 번호가 없는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6834">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6835">"M"을 나타내는 대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6835">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6836">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6836">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6837">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6837">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6838">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6838">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6839">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6839">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6840">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6840">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6841">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6841">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6842">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6842">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6843">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6843">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6844">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6844">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6845">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6845">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6876">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6876">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6877">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6877">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6878">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6878">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6879">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6879">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6880">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6880">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6881">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6881">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6882">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" (여기에서 "pwd" 앞에 소문자 문자가 오지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6882">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6883">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6883">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6884">달러 기호 ($), 백분율 기호 (%, 부등호 (>), 기호 (@), 따옴표 ("), 세미콜론 (;), 왼쪽 중괄호 ([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호 ({))가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6884">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6885">세미콜론 (;), 슬래시 (/) 또는 따옴표 (")가 아닌 7-128 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6885">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6886">세미콜론 (;) 또는 따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6886">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6887">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6887">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6888">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6888">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6889">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6889">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6890">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6890">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6891">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6891">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6892">CEP_GlobalFilter의 키워드를 찾을 수 **없습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6892">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6893">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6893">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6894">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6894">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6895">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6895">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6896">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6896">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6897">일부 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6897">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6898">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6898">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6899">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6899">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6900">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6900">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6901">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6901">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6902">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6902">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6903">암호나 pwd에 0-2 공백, 등호 (=), 0-2 공백 및 별표 (\*)-----------------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6903">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6904">암호나 pwd 뒤에 다음이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6904">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6905">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6905">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6906">보다 작음 기호 (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6906">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6907">대문자나 소문자, digits, 별표 (\*), 하이픈 (-), 밑줄 (_) 또는 공백 문자인 1-200 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6907">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6908">보다 큼 기호 (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6908">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6912">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6912">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6913">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6913">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6914">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6914">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6915">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6915">onebox</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6922">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6922">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6923">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6923">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6924">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6924">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6925">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6925">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6926">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6926">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6927">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6927">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6928">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6928">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6929">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6929">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6930">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6930">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6931">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6931">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6932">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6932">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6933">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6933">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6934">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6934">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6935">정규식이 해당  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6935">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6936">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6936">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6937">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6937">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6938">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6938">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6939">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6939">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6940">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6940">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6941">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6941">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6942">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6942">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6943">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6943">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6944">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6944">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6945">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6945">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6946">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6946">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6947">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6947">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6948">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6948">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6949">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6949">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6950">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6950">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6951">körkort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6951">körkort</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6952">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6952">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6953">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6953">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6954">10 또는 12 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6954">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6955">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6955">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6956">10 또는 12 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6956">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6957">두 자리 숫자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6957">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6958">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6958">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6959">구분 기호 "-" 또는 "+" (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6959">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6960">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6960">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6961">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6961">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6962">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6962">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6963">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6963">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6964">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6964">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6965">이 함수는 해당 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6965">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6966">From 키워드를 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6966">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6967">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6967">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6968">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6968">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6969">이 함수는 해당 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6969">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6970">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6970">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6977">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6977">identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6979">identifikationsnumret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6979">identifikationsnumret</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6980">identitetshandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6980">identitetshandling</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6981">id 문서</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6981">identity document</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6989">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6989">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6990">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6990">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6991">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6991">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6992">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6992">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6993">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6993">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6994">8 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6994">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6995">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6995">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6996">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6996">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-6997">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6997">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-6998">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6998">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-6999">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-6999">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7000">다음 중 하나가 충족 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7000">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7001">Keyword_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7001">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7002">Keyword_sweden_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7002">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
