## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7033">스웨덴 주민 등록 번호 또는 이와 동등한 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7033">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7034">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7034">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7035">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7035">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7036">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7036">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7037">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7037">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7038">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7038">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7039">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 8 자리 숫자 (YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7039">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7040">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7040">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7041">일련 번호의 마지막 숫자는 남성에 홀수를 할당 하는 성별과 암의 짝수를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7041">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7042">최대 1990의 일련 번호를 사용 하 여 전화를 corresponded 하는 국가 (1947 이전 1947에는 immigrants 앞에 탄생 한 경우)에는 세금 기록에 따라 해당 번호에 대 한 특수 코드 (일반적으로 9 자리 숫자)가 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7042">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7043">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7043">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7044">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7044">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7045">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7045">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7046">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7046">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7047">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7047">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7048">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7048">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7049">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7049">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7050">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7050">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7051">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7051">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7052">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7052">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7053">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7053">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7067">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7067">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7068">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7068">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7069">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 숫자와 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7069">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7070">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7070">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7071">10 자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7071">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7072">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7072">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7073">더하기 기호 또는 빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7073">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7074">다음은 식별 번호를 고유 하 게 만드는 3 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7074">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7075">1990 이전에 실행 된 번호의 경우 일곱째 및 여덟 번째 숫자는 출생 또는 외부에서 태어난 사람의 국가를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7075">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7076">아홉 번째 위치의 숫자는 성별에 대 한 홀수 또는 암도를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7076">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7077">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7077">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7078">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7078">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7079">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7079">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7080">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7080">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7081">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7081">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7082">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7082">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7083">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7083">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7084">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7084">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7085">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7085">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7086">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7086">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7087">Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7087">Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7088">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7088">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7089">personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7089">personnummer</span></span>

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7111">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7111">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7112">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7112">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7113">4 개 문자 다음에 5-31 자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7113">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7114">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7114">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7115">4 개의 문자와 5-31 자의 문자 또는 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7115">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7116">4 문자 은행 코드 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7116">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7117">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7117">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7118">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7118">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7119">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7119">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7120">1 ~ 3 개의 문자 또는 숫자 (BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7120">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7121">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7121">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7122">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7122">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7123">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7123">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7124">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7124">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7125">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7125">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7126">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7126">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swiss-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7160">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7160">Swiss SSN AHV number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7161">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7161">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7162">13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7162">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7163">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7163">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7164">13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7164">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7165">3 자리 숫자-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7165">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7166">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7166">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7167">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7167">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7168">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7168">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7169">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7169">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7170">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7170">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7171">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7171">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7172">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7173">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7173">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7174">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7175">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7175">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7176">Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7176">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7177">Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7177">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7178">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7178">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7179">Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7179">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7199">numéro de sécurité sociale</span></span>

   
## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7200">대만식 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7200">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7201">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7201">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7202">1 개 문자 (영문)와 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7202">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7203">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7203">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7204">1 개 문자 (영문)와 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7204">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7205">1 개 문자 (영문, 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7205">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7206">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7206">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7207">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7207">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7208">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7208">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7209">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7209">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7210">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7210">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7211">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7211">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7212">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7212">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7213">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7213">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7214">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7214">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7215">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7215">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7216">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7216">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7217">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7226">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7226">身分證號碼</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7229">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7229">國民身分證統一編號</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7233">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7233">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7234">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7234">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7235">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7235">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7236">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7236">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7237">비-생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7237">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7238">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7238">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7239">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7239">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7240">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7240">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7241">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7241">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7242">비-생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7242">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7243">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7243">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7244">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7244">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7245">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7245">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7246">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7246">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7247">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7247">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7248">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7248">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7249">Keyword_taiwan_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7249">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7260">대만 상주 인증서 (ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7260">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7261">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7261">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7262">10 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7262">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7263">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7263">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7264">10 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7264">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7265">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7265">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7266">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7266">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7267">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7267">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7268">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7268">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7269">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7269">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7270">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7270">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7271">정규식 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7271">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7272">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7272">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7273">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7273">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7274">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7274">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7278">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7278">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7279">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7279">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7284">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7284">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7285">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7285">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7286">태국어 인구 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7286">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7287">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7287">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7288">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7288">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7289">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7289">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7290">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7290">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7291">첫 번째 숫자는 0 또는 9가 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7291">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7292">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7292">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7293">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7294">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7294">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7295">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7296">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7296">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7297">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7297">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7298">Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7298">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7299">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7299">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7300">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7300">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7309">터키어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7309">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7310">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7310">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7311">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7311">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7312">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7312">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7313">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7313">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7314">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7314">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7315">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7315">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7316">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7316">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7317">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7317">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7318">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7318">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7319">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7319">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7320">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7320">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7321">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7321">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7322">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7322">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7323">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7323">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7324">TC Kimlik 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7324">TC Kimlik No</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7327">Vatandaşlık 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7327">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7328">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7328">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7329">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7329">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7330">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7330">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7331">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7332">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7332">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7333">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7334">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7334">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7335">5 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"를 입력할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7335">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7336">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7336">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7337">날짜 형식의 5 자리 숫자 MMDDY 생년월일 (드라이버가 암 인 경우 50이 고 62 51은 01부터 12까지)로 증가 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7337">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7338">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7338">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7339">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7339">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7340">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7340">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7341">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7341">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7342">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7342">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7343">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7343">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7344">Func_uk_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7344">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7345">Keyword_uk_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7345">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7346">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7346">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7356">motorcycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7356">motorcycles</span></span>

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7364">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7364">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7365">electoral 롤 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7365">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7366">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7366">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7367">2 개의 문자와 1-4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7367">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7368">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7368">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7369">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 1-4 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7369">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7370">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7370">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7371">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7371">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7372">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7372">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7373">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7373">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7374">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7374">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7375">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7375">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7376">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7376">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7377">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7377">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7380">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7380">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7381">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7381">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7382">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7382">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7383">국가 의료 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7383">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7384">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7384">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7385">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7385">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7386">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7386">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7387">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7387">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7388">3 또는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7388">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7389">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7389">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7390">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7390">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7391">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7391">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7392">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7392">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7393">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7393">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7394">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7394">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7395">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7395">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7396">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7396">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7397">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7397">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7398">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7398">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7399">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7399">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7400">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7400">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7401">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7401">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7402">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7402">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7420">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7420">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7421">국가 보험 번호 (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7421">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7422">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7422">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7423">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7423">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7424">공백 또는 대시로 구분 된 7 개 문자 또는 9 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7424">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7425">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7425">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7426">다음과 같은 두 가지 패턴을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7426">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7427">두 문자 (유효한 NINOs이 접두사의 특정 문자만 사용 하며이 패턴의 유효성 검사는 대/소문자를 구분 하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7427">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7428">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7428">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7429">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' (접두사와 마찬가지로 접미사에서는 특정 문자만 허용 되며 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7429">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7430">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7430">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7431">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7431">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7432">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7432">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7433">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7433">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7434">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7434">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7435">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7435">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7436">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7436">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7437">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7437">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7438">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7438">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7439">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' 중 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7439">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7440">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7440">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7441">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7441">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7442">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7442">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7443">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7443">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7444">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7444">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7445">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7445">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7446">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7446">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7447">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7447">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7448">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7448">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7470">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7470">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7471">고유 Taxpayer 참조 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7471">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7472">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7472">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7473">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7473">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7474">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7474">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7475">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7475">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7476">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7476">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7477">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7477">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7478">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7478">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7479">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7479">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7480">이 함수는 해당  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7480">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7481">From 키워드를  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7481">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7482">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7482">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7501">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7501">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7502">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7502">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7503">8-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7503">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7504">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7504">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7505">8-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7505">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7506">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7506">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7507">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7507">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7508">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7508">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7509">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7509">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7510">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7510">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7511">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7511">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7541">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7541">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7542">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7542">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7543">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7543">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7544">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7544">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7545">주 (예: 뉴욕)에 따라 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7545">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7546">ddd ddd ddd와 같이 9 자리 숫자는 일치 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7546">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7547">ddddddddd와 같은 9 자리 숫자가 일치 하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7547">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7548">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7548">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7549">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7549">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7550">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7550">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7551">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7551">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7552">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7552">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7553">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7553">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7554">Keyword_us_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7554">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7555">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7555">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7556">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7556">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7557">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7557">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7558">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7558">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7559">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7559">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7657">미국 ITIN (개별 taxpayer 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7657">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7658">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7659">"9"로 시작 하 고, "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함 하 고, 필요에 따라 공백이 나 대시로 서식이 지정 된 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7659">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7660">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7661">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7661">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7662">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7662">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7663">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7663">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7664">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7664">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7665">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7665">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7666">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7666">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7667">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7667">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7668">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7668">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7669">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7669">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7670">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7670">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7671">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7671">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7672">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7672">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7673">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7673">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7674">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7674">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7675">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7675">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7676">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7676">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7677">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7677">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7678">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7678">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7679">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7679">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7680">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7680">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7681">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7681">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7682">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7682">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7683">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7683">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7684">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7684">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7685">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7685">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7686">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7686">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7687">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7687">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7688">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7688">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7689">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7689">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7710">미국 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7710">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7711">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7711">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7712">서식이 지정 되거나 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시 될 수 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7712">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7713">Mid가 2011 이전에 실행 된 경우 SSN은 특정 범위 내에서 번호의 특정 부분이 유효한 지 확인 하는 강력한 서식을 사용 해야 하지만 검사 값은 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7713">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7714">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7714">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7715">다음의 네 가지 패턴에서 SSNs를 검색 하는 함수는 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7715">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7716">Func_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 2011 이전 수준의 서식으로 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7716">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7717">Func_unformatted_ssn는 형식이 지정 되지 않은 2011 이전 형식으로 서식이 지정 된 SSNs를 찾고 (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7717">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7718">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 post-2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7718">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7719">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn는 형식 없는 2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7719">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7720">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7720">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7721">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7721">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7722">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7722">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7723">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7723">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7724">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7724">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7725">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7725">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7726">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7726">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7727">Func_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7727">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7728">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7728">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7729">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7729">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7730">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7730">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7731">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7731">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7732">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7732">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7733">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7733">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7734">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7734">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7735">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7735">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7739">소셜 보안 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7739">social security #</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7741">소셜 보안 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7741">social security no</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7749">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7749">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7750">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7750">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7751">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7751">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7752">passport 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7752">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7753">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7753">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7754">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7754">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7755">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7755">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7756">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7756">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7757">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7757">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7758">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7758">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7759">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7759">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7760">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7760">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7761">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7761">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7762">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7762">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
