## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7783">우크라이나 passport 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7783">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7784">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7784">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7785">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7785">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7786">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7786">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7787">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7787">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7788">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7789">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7789">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7790">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7791">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7791">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7792">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7792">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7793">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7793">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7794">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7794">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7795">Keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7795">Keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7796">우크라이나 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7796">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7797">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7797">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7798">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7798">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7799">паспорт України</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7799">паспорт України</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7800">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7800">номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7801">персональний</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7801">персональний</span></span>


## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7802">우크라이나 여권 국제 전화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7802">Ukraine passport international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7803">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7803">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7804">8 자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7804">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7805">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7805">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7806">8 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7806">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7807">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7807">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7808">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7808">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7809">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7809">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7810">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7810">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e388e-7811">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7811">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e388e-7812">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7812">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7813">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7813">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e388e-7814">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e388e-7814">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
